quote: The stars are far brighterThan gems without measure,The moon is far whiterThan silver in treasure;The fire is more shiningOn hearth in the gloamingThan gold won by mining,So why go a-roaming?
quote_letters: THE STARS ARE FAR BRIGHTERTHAN GEMS WITHOUT MEASURETHE MOON IS FAR WHITERTHAN SILVER IN TREASURETHE FIRE IS MORE SHININGON HEARTH IN THE GLOAMINGTHAN GOLD WON BY MININGSO WHY GO A-ROAMING
